settings.heading: Welcome to ArtGlo, where art meets illumination, and creativity knows no bounds
settings.page_description: We're more than just an online store! We're a community of artists, dreamers, and visionaries who believe that art has the power to transform outdoor spaces, ignite imaginations, and create memorable moments.

settings.storyTitle: Our Story: Illuminating the World of Art
settings.description:
ArtGlo was born from a passion for art and a desire to make it accessible to everyone, anywhere, at any time. We understand that art isn't just something you hang on your wall; it's a reflection of your personality, your experiences, and your unique vision.

Our journey began with a simple idea: What if outdoor art could be more than just your grandma’s garden gnome? What if it could come to life, captivating your senses and creating immersive experiences? That's where illumination became our muse, and ArtGlo was born.

settings.title: Our story is your story. You want to do good work. You're motivated by mission and purpose. And you want your work to make a difference. We want the same thing.
